issue.title: [CF 1086] TellMeWhen not working!
issue.body:
TellMeWhen: TellMeWhen cannot perform that action if the addon failed to initialize!
TellMeWhen: TellMeWhen_Options cannot be loaded if TellMeWhen failed to initialize!


> Posted by CurseForge user Zafurry | Imported from CurseForge issue #1086 | Raw

comments.body:
Please ensure that you have all libraries required by TellMeWhen if you are using nolib versions of the addon.

If you are still experiencing issues, enable Lua errors (Game Menu > Interface > Help > Display Lua Errors), reload your UI, and post any errors that you get that relate to TellMeWhen in a new ticket.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
